programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to catch a Moon Jelly in 'Mooned!', then in 'Hysterical History', Sandy learns some Bikini Bottom history. (S14, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Z's All That: Phoebe & Max get to act as a superhero mentor to one of their siblings, but quickly regret selecting Nora after seeing Billy's surprisingly impressive skillset. (S4, ep 17)

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: A Tale of Three Parties: On the same night: Lincoln and Clyde want to host a candy game, Lori and Leni want to host a masquerade party, and Lucy's hosting the Morticians Club!. (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Secret Beef: With an invitation to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant, Henry decides to take his boss, Ray, but finds it more complicated than expected. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's Jelly: After Jasper is lauded for being a local hero, Henry becomes jealous that Kid Danger is the one getting thanks while Henry himself gets nothing. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Prank U Next: Max seeks help dealing with a mystery prankster at school from his old principal, who was always the target of his pranks. But Max fails to stop the pranks, and quits! (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: From Dust Till Dawn: Chloe is struggling with her leadership skills, but when a villain attacks her school field trip, Max and Phoebe have to put Chloe in charge. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Monsieur Man Returns: When Captain Man goes on strike because he refuses to pay for art that he destroyed on a mission, the Vice-Mayor hires a new hero to defend Swellview - Monsieur Man. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Peezy B: Sam gets a job as the assistant to the rap star Peezy B. Meanwhile, Cat finds babysitting much more challenging without Sam around to help. Guest starring Kel Mitchell. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Pain in the Bat Mitzvah: Lydia's Bat Mitzvah is coming up, which means this is her opportunity to invite all the popular kids to her grand, out of this world party! (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Beginning of the End: Kid Danger reveals to Captain Man that he doesn't want to be stuck in Swellview as a sidekick forever. Kid Danger is recruited by another town to be their hero. (S5, ep 37)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Drex: Captain Man's old sidekick and nemesis, Drex, returns from the past with an army of cavemen to finish off Captain Man once and for all. (S5, ep 38)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Mall Time Crooks: Phoebe and Max turn a trip to the mall to pick up Hank's birthday gift into chaos, with a run-in with security that threatens to derail their dad's birthday. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: It's Not What You Link: Max and Link fight, so Phoebe helps them become friends. When Link starts spending more time with Max than her, Phoebe's plan may have worked too well. (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Who Did It To Trina?: Trina stars in Tori's directorial debut, but an accident takes Trina out. Lane wants to find out what went wrong. Was it a malfunction, or sabotage? (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Beggin' On Your Knees: When Tori gets the chance to work with a handsome guy on a project, she jumps at the chance. Is she right to be suspicious that he's everything he seems? (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny sends Squidina to camp, so Patrick works with new staff in 'Is there a Director in the House?', then in 'Star Cruise', the Star family enjoys a cruise ship vacation... in outer space. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends
programme.desc: Has-been Hero: Po's kung fu hero comes to town for an exhibition match. But the hero is all washed up and asks Po to throw a fight to make him famous again. (S1, ep 26)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Time Traveller's Party: Simon tells Alvin time travel is impossible, until a man from the future shows up at their home. (S5, ep 8b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Gone Gal: When Miss Croner has a disagreement with Miss Miller, she fakes her disappearance to get even. (S5, ep 8a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Bathroom Bully: When Miss Smith praises Simon's grades in class, Derek bullies him by not allowing him to use the boys' bathroom. (S5, ep 9b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Return of Thornbergaupht: Simon's interactive video game is about to take off, until Jeanette reprograms the game's villain. (S5, ep 10a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is injured at work in 'The Splinter', while in 'Slide Whistle Stooges', SpongeBob and Patrick are driving Squidward crazy with their new slide whistles.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick decides it's time to start living life like Larry the Lobster in 'A Life In A Day', and then in 'Sun Bleached', SpongeBob tries to get a tan, with disappointing results.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln tries to delay his parent-teacher conference in 'Stall Monitor', then in 'A Pimple Plan', Luan wakes up with a pimple on the day of her first date with Benny. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Addicted: The Chipettes challenge the Chipmunks to go three hours without their favourite things. How hard can it be?

programme.desc: Spoiler-Itis: When Alvin is accused of revealing spoilers for everyone's favourite TV show, he agrees not to speak for 24 hours.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Something's Fishy: When Alvin and Simon think Theodore's pet goldfish has died, they go all out to replace it before he notices.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Oh Brother Where Art Thou: Alvin thinks he's losing his mind when Simon goes missing and no one else even remembers who Simon is.

programme.desc: Kung Fu Day Care: Tigress is forced to babysit a small child who has been separated from his parents. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mysterious hooks appear in Bikini Bottom and Mr Krabs warns SpongeBob to stay away from them in 'Hooks', while in 'Mermaidman and Barnacleboy II' SpongeBob wins a big prize! (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Fake Brother: Grizzy builds a lookalike robot to keep the lemmings away while he prepares a party for she-bear. But his double is not as clever as Grizzy had hoped... (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Team Jay
programme.desc: Project Blackout / Meena Girls: At the annual Supervillains Workshop and Conference, Hannibal proposes an alliance of the Forces of Darkness to pull off their most high-profile heist ever! (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Team Jay
programme.desc: Day of the Dead / No I in Team: It's the Day of the Dead! Team Jay is leading the parade through town when a mysterious orange glow stops them. It's Jay's great-great-grandfather, Jacopo! (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Dance, Magic, Dance!: Forced to take refuge in the Creepy Kelp Forest, the Mermicornos find themselves at the mercy of the mischievous Water Sprites. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Rocketear: As Guardian of the Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions which affect the people around her. (S4 Ep17)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Catalyst: A Shard causes freak weather but the Beasticons aren't up for the hunt. When they go into a frozen state, Jade is desperate enough to leave them in Xinyan's "care." (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Burgled Bags / The Case of the Distracted Detective: When Gary, the school's lollipop man, is accused of stealing bags from parents' cars, Kyle is devastated. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Piccolo vs Frost! Bet Everything on the Makankosappo!: Goku is defeated in the second match! Beerus is angry, but the tournament still continues. The third match is Frost vs Piccolo. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Rogercop: Chloe accuses Marinette of stealing her new bracelet, starting a series of events that allows Hawk Moth to akumatize Sabrina's policeman father. (S1 Ep11)

programme.desc: Gamer: Adrien and Max, who have the highest scores on the Ultimate Robot Strike videogame, have to compete together in a major tournament. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Pokémon Master Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Sleuths for Truth!: A rash of wrong-doing is gripping Vermilion City, but our heroes are there to crack the case! (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Van Hogling: Chef and the kids take a field trip to Sugar's farm, but ignoring all of Sugar's strict and boring farm rules has dire consequences. (S3 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ticking Crime Bomb: Leshawna and Izzy trick Owen into thinking he's destined to be a criminal mastermind, but when he joins the scariest gang in town they have to mount a rescue attempt. (S3 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Knit Wit: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: knitting. But after using it to save his classmates, he proudly admits it. (S3 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi yn pledio ar Abel i adael iddi fynd â pharsel i Digbi er mwyn ymddiheuro iddo. Betsi pleads with Abel to let her deliver Digbi's parcel so she can apologise to him.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn holi 'Pam bod arogl neis ar flodau?', ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am arddwr gorau'n byd a'i phridd arbennig. Today Nel asks Tad-cu, 'Why do flowers smell so nice?'.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wedi creu cerbyd newydd sbon ar olwynion. Cen Twyn has created a brand new vehicle with wheels. Twt achieves one of his dreams and is able to come out of the water.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Yr Whws

programme.title: Sion y Chef

programme.title: Sam Tan

programme.title: Octonots

programme.title: Help Llaw

programme.title: Penny Gold
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Director Jack Cardiff. Stars James Booth, Francesca Annis & Nicky Henson. Mathew is determined to crack the murder of a young woman whose body is identified by her identical twin. [S]

programme.title: Doublecross
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director Anthony Squire. Stars Donald Houston, Fay Compton, William Hartnell. A Cornish poacher clashes with dangerous international spies. [S]

programme.title: A Home for Max Miller
programme.desc: A delightful and entertaining film about the on-going search to find a permanent home in Brighton for the mass of Max Miller memorabilia The Max Miller Appreciation Society holds. [S]

programme.title: Where Strangers Meet
programme.desc: 1951. A magnificent travelogue about Soho, featuring the streets, businesses and people you would find in this area of London in the 1950s.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp Becomes a Marshal. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Mason Alan Dinehart & Denver Pyle. The career of the famous Western lawman begins after he takes over for the murdered sheriff of Ellsworth. [S]

programme.title: The Gentle Trap
programme.desc: 1960. A locksmith on his first burglary is on the run when a rival gang wants his haul. Stars Spencer Teakle & Martin Benson. [S]

programme.title: Bond of Fear
programme.desc: 1956. Crime Drama. Directed by Henry Cass. Stars Dermot Walsh and Jane Barrett. Filmed at Nettlefold. A man and his family on a caravan holiday in France are taken hostage by an escaped convict. [S]

programme.title: Gaolbreak
programme.desc: 1962. Directed by Francis Searle and starring Peter Reynolds, Avice Landon and David Kernan. A mother and her two sons run a newsagents as a front for their criminal activity. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: Here Comes the Suit
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Richard Kinon. Stars David Niven, Jesse White, Allison Hayes. A timid businessman becomes the centre of attention after getting a new suit from a shady tailor.

programme.title: The Paper Gallows
programme.desc: 1950. Thriller. Directed by John Guillermin. Stars John Bentley, Dermot Walsh & Rona Anderson. A crime novelist, jealous over his secretary's affection for his brother, decides to murder her. [S]

programme.title: Nearest and Dearest
programme.desc: 1972. Comedy. Directed by John Robins. Stars Hylda Baker, Jimmy Jewel & Edward Malin. After their father's death, two siblings inherit a decrepit pickle factory and attempt to keep it afloat. [S]

programme.title: Make Me An Offer
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Directed by Cyril Frankel. Starring Peter Finch. The story of Charlie, who as a boy fell in love with a Portland Vase on a trip to a museum, pursues his dream as an antiques dealer. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Digging Up the Past
programme.desc: 1964. A remarkable view of an archaeological dig by both professionals and amateurs to discover ancient Roman remains.

programme.title: The History Of Mr Polly
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Director: Anthony Pelissier. Stars John Mills, Betty Ann Davies, Megs Jenkins, Moore Marriott & Finlay Currie. Alfred reluctantly uses inherited money on two big ventures. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Locker Sixty-Nine. 1962. Directed by Norman Harrison. Stars Eddie Byrne, Paul Daneman & Penelope Horner. A private detective is knocked unconscious after finding the body of his employer. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: All the Dead Were Harrisons. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Marguerite Brennan & Geoffrey Denton. Scotland Yard is puzzled by the mysterious deaths of several people, all with the surname Harrison. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Greatest Mother of Them All. 1966. Stars Adam West, Shelley Winters & Tisha Sterling. The infamous Ma Parker and her fiendish children raid Gotham's Ladies Auxiliary's Mother of the Year Awards. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Fashions in crime. 1958. Stars Rober Beatty, Gerald Case & Olga Dickie. A top designer claims his work is being plagiarised. Maguire believes the complaint does not warrant immediate attention. [S]

programme.title: Nor the Moon By Night
programme.desc: 1958. Adventure. Director: Ken Annakin. Stars Michael Craig, Belinda Lee, Patrick McGoohan. After a the loss of her mother, a young women sets out to find her African pen pal. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro is here to embark on a journey of terror with you tonight. First up, is the 1996 supernatural horror Amityville: Dollhouse, where evil lurks in a young girl's doll house. [S]

programme.title: Amityville: Dollhouse
programme.desc: 1996. Horror. Director: Steve White. Stars Robin Thomas, Starr Andreeff & Allen Cutler. A girl inadvertently releases evil spirits lurking within her toy house, which wreak havoc upon her family. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: We venture into the paranormal in Caroline Munro's next offering - 100 Years of Horror. This documentary, presented by the legendary Christopher Lee, explores the history of classic horror films. [S]

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: 1998. Documentary. Directed by Ted Newson. King of Horror, Christopher Lee, takes us on a frightening journey from the earliest horror movies to modern day slashers! [S]

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: 1998. Documentary. Directed by Ted Newson. King of Horror, Christopher Lee, takes us on a frightening journey from the earliest horror movies to modern day slashers! [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro is joined by otherworldly beings, as she takes a look at next week's thrilling films. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: Last Video and Testament. 1984. Stars Deborah Raffin & David Langton. A wealthy businessman about to undergo surgery has a surprise in store for his wife and her lover. [S]

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: 1930. Tobey Mitchell, a young Parisian balloon vendor with ambitions to become a designer of pageants, guards his stand in the Street of the Poor.

programme.title: Look At Life Fings Are Getting Smaller
programme.desc: 1964. A fascinating look at how everything is being reduced in size to fit in with the new compact age.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Saves Drydale's Marriage. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Raymond Bailey & Irene Ryan. Drysdale's marriage is threatened by a misunderstanding when he looks for a housekeeper while his wife is away. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: Fork in the Road. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Robert Bray. While on their regular stagecoach run Simon and Davey Kane pick up a man walking by the road in the middle of nowhere. [S]

programme.title: The Hostage
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. A South American revolutionary is facing death for murder but the President's daughter in London is taken hostage. Starring Ron Randell. [S]

programme.title: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: 1947. Crime drama. Directed by William Berke and starring Russell Wade, Luana Walters and Edmund MacDonald. A woman marries a corrupt D.A. to get evidence to help on a recent murder. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: A Place Full of Strangers
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Roy Kellino. Stars Dick Powell & Dina Merrill. An overworked businessman tries to escape from his hectic life and goes on a surreal bus trip to 'Meadville'.

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: 1953. Directed by John Gilling. Filmed at Alliance Studios, Twickenham. Stars Elizabeth Sellars, Kieron Moore. A jeweller's daughter seeks revenge on a gang that robbed and killed her father. [S]

programme.title: A Cry From The Streets
programme.desc: 1958. Drama starring Max Bygraves, Barbara Murray and Colin Petersen. A welfare worker becomes emotionally involved with a group of homeless children. Music by Larry Adler. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Golden West
programme.desc: 1964. A glance at the hidden wealth of Cornwall - of its tin, granite and stone; with a look at the declining tin mining industry and how unemployment can be helped by the development of new industry.

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Guilt Beneath the Gingerbread. 1974. Stars Richard Easton, Bill Treacher & Timothy Carlton. Brian finds himself alone to answer police questioning. Meanwhile, unrest at the depot continues. [S]

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by Monte Hellman. Stars Jack Nicholson, Cameron Mitchell & Millie Perkins. Three cowboys are pursued by a relentless posse after being mistaken for a gang of outlaws. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Behave Yourself. 1962. An amusing guide on how to act in public, based on Emily Post's Book of Manners.

programme.title: Operation Stogie

programme.title: Strange But True

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Scot Free. 1976. Stars John Blackburn, Rupen Budhdeo, Douglas Fielding & Pat Gorman. Two boys are trapped in a disused mine, but why is their friend terrified of going to the police? [S]

programme.title: Manhunt

programme.title: Maigret

programme.title: The Place of the Dead

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: The Library: Cory gets his very own library card, but can he keep it after he misplaces a library book? (S1 Ep44)

programme.desc: Harry Hoodini: When local magician Harry Hoodini visits the Motorsorri to put on a show, Frannie takes it upon herself to prove to the class that magic isn't real. (S1 Ep46)

programme.desc: Treasure Quest: When Bubble angers her guest, Maxi, by skipping over the fun parts of a treasure quest, she has to find an adventurous way to make it up to her. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Wingin' It: Abee doesn't know why all her black-and-yellow friends are flying away from her, so Bubble and Nabi set out to teach Abee all about the 'flight of the bumblebee'. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
